data.name: TYRONE vs COPS VR
data.detailed_description:
Tyrone was minding his own business, when the cops rolled up with weapons drawn, claiming that they had a warrant for his arrest... It's time to teach those pigs a lesson! This is a short roguelike game exploring the reality of police brutality in America.

Experience the plight of Tyrone like never before in highly immersive first-person VR, and with all new gameplay mechanics!

Features
  • Play as Tyrone in VR
  • Hold your gun sideways
  • Shoot it at cops
  • Loot their weapons after you kill them
  • Many different types of law enforcement officers, including BOSS COPS
  • Awaken the latent power of your melanin using kills from your past lives
  • Receive assistance from Federal Agents
  • Drink lean

data.short_description: Awaken the latent power of your melanin and kill cops in this thought-provoking game on police brutality in America... Now in highly immersive first-person VR, and with all new gameplay mechanics!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Quad Core or similar
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 770 / AMD R9 260
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SteamVR is required

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: TW: police, drugs, violence, firearms, blood, loud noises, rap music, feds.
